fields.description:
Unable to create classic as well as alloy app after updating CLI to 3.2.0-cr2

On titanium@3.2.0-cr its working fine.

No logs on studio are generated.
fields.summary: CLI:Unable to create both classic and alloy app with titanium@3.2.0-cr2
fields.environment:
Tested Environment:

Appcelerator Studio: 3.2.0.201312101708
SDK:3.2.0.v20131210191510
alloy: 1.3.0-cr
acs: 1.0.10
npm: 1.3.2
titanium: 3.2.0-cr2
titanium-code-processor: 1.1.0-cr2
Xcode:5.0.2
OS: Mac OSX 10.9

comments.body:
Verified with:
Tested Environment:

Appcelerator Studio: 3.2.0.201312101708
SDK:3.2.0.v20131210191510
alloy: 1.3.0-cr
acs: 1.0.10
npm: 1.3.2
titanium: 3.2.0-cr3
titanium-code-processor: 1.1.0-cr2
Xcode:5.0.2
OS: Mac OSX 10.9

Working fine was able to create alloy as well as classic project.
